markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Mutated Sewer Ooze](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1633)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Ooze](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 32

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Mutated Sewer Ooze](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1633)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Mutant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=229" />
<trait label="Ooze" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=122" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 37</row>

**Perception** +10; motion sense 60 feet, no vision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** -2

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Motion Sense** A sewer ooze can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movements.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 45

**Immunities**
[acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), critical hits, [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)

**Noxious Scent** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 30 feet. A creature that enters the area must attempt a DC 23 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (sickened 2 on a critical failure). A creature taking [persistent acid damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) from the ooze's pseudopod can't recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pseudopod +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d8+5 bludgeoning plus 1d4 acid and 1d4 [persistent acid](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Filth Wave** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per minute; **Effect** The sewer ooze unleashes a wave of filth, covering all creatures within a 20-foot emanation. Each creature in the area must succeed at a DC 24 Reflex save or take 1d4 acid damage and a –10-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (on a critical failure, the creature also falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31)). A creature can spend an Interact action to clean someone off, decreasing the Speed penalty by 5 feet with each action

</column>
name: Mutated Sewer Ooze

text: Mutated Sewer Ooze Recall Knowledge - Ooze (Occultism): DC 32 Unspecific Lore : DC 30 Specific Lore : DC 27 Mutated Sewer Ooze Source Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 37 Perception +10; motion sense 60 feet, no vision Languages Skills Stealth +9 Str +5 Dex -2 Con +4 Int -5 Wis +0 Cha -5 Motion Sense A sewer ooze can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movements. --- AC 16 Fort +16 Ref +8 Will +10 HP 45 Immunities acid, critical hits, mental, precision, unconscious, visual Noxious Scent (aura, olfactory) 30 feet. A creature that enters the area must attempt a DC 23 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is sickened 1 (sickened 2 on a critical failure). A creature taking persistent acid damage from the ooze's pseudopod can't recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute. --- Speed 10 feet Melee Single Action pseudopod +17 (Agile, deadly d10, Finesse, versatile S), Damage 2d8+5 bludgeoning plus 1d4 acid and 1d4 persistent acid Filth Wave Single Action Frequency once per minute; Effect The sewer ooze unleashes a wave of filth, covering all creatures within a 20-foot emanation. Each creature in the area must succeed at a DC 24 Reflex save or take 1d4 acid damage and a –10-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (on a critical failure, the creature also falls prone). A creature can spend an Interact action to clean someone off, decreasing the Speed penalty by 5 feet with each action
